article_title: Direct Primary Care: Restoring The Doctor-Patient Relationship

article_metadata.author: Katherine Restrepo

og.description: The excessive amount of government intervention that has been entrenched in our nation’s health care system is curiously pushing medical providers to channel this negative energy into positive solutions – ones in which physicians are either scaling back or cutting off their relationships with middleman insurers to spend more time [...]
